thread.title: One dies in Sandton bridge collapse
thread.title_full: One dies in Sandton bridge collapse | News24

author: news24.com
title: One dies in Sandton bridge collapse
text:
Johannesburg - At least one person has died after a bridge under construction collapsed on the M1 highway in Sandton, paramedics said.
- Were you there? Send us your eyewitness accounts and photos .
ER24 said in a statement that at least 17 people were injured, while Netcare 911 said on Twitter that 15 people were injured - five critically.
ER24 spokesperson Pieter Rossouw said several paramedics and emergency services officials were on the scene.
